title: Best 97 Slow-Cooker Recipes - Easy Crockpot Meal Ideas
description: Set and forget your way to some pretty incredible meals.
body: <style type="text/css">#sidepanel{transform:translateX(0);visibility:visible;content-visibility:auto;}@media (max-width:425px){#sidepanel{width:7rem;max-width:7rem;}#sidepanel .nav-item,#sidepanel .nav-item a,#sidepanel footer a,#sidepanel div a,#sidepanel a span{font-size:10px;}#sidepanel ul,#sidepanel div{padding:0;margin:0;}#sidepanel button{display:none;}}</style>SearchMy RecipesSubscribeMembership BenefitsRecipesMealsHolidaysFood TrendsNewsKitchen Tips & ToolsAll VideosAbout UsNewsletterDelish ShopFollowOther EditionsYour Privacy ChoicesPrivacy NoticeTerms Of UseSkip to ContentRecipesDinnersSpring RecipesKitchen TipsNewsSubscribesign inSearchLemon Blueberry DessertsSpring SaladsCopycat Recipe IdeasBrunch RecipesSpring DinnersMeals & CookingRecipe HeadquartersThe 97 Slow-Cooker Recipes I Pull From When I've Got No Time For Hands-On CookingThe 97 Slow-Cooker Recipes I Pull From When I've Got No Time For Hands-On CookingSet and forget your way to some pretty incredible meals.  By Mackenzie FilsonUpdated: Aug 22, 2024Save ArticlePHOTO: ROCKY LUTEN; FOOD STYLING: LENA ABRAHAMWhether you're cooking for the whole family, are slow cooking just for two, or need to feed a party, we can all agree—a crock-pot is kind of a miracle appliance. Though we bet you've already got some tried and true recipes (hello, standbys like pulled pork and beef chili), why stop there? Slow cookers can do everything from breakfast to dessert (seriously!), so what are you waiting for? Check out these 97 slow-cooker recipes, then set it and forget it!There is NOTHING better than coming home from a long day to a home-cooked meal, and the slow cooker makes it easy, whether you're a beginner cook or someone with more experience who's constantly on the run. Classics like chicken Alfredo, pepper steak, beef & broccoli, chicken cacciatore, and more might just taste even better in the crockpot (and are certainly way more hands-off than their skillet or baking dish counterparts). We've even got some recipes on this list you might have never thought you could make in a slow cooker. Trust us, you can make everything from pizza to meatballs (like in our slow-cooker Tuscan chicken meatballs with gnocchi) to mac & cheese in yours!We also love how much easier a slow cooker makes cooking up all of your party faves. Consider making your favorite dips and appetizers in your crockpot to save yourself a whole lot of stress and prep time. If you're low on oven or grilling space during game days, movie nights, or cookouts, use your slow cooker to make BBQ brown sugar pulled chicken, Buffalo ranch wings, chicken tinga tacos, or sausage & peppers. Grab a pack of slider buns or tortillas and you'll be ready to party! Your slow cooker can even make sweets, and our crock-pot banana cake, our slow-cooker chocolate chip cookie, our crock-pot hot cocoa, and our pumpkin spice slow-cooker oatmeal are proof. Whether you're making them for a crowd over the holidays or during the warmer months when you can't bear to turn on the oven, they're sure to satisfy.Loving the possibilities of countertop appliances? Check out all our best air-fryer recipes and Instant Pot recipes next! 1Slow-Cooker Shrimp BoilPHOTO: RACHEL VANNI ; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONThe end of summer usually calls for a shrimp boil...but it’s almost always too hot to turn the stove on! The solution is simple: Throw those same ingredients into the slow cooker and let the machine do the work while you lounge in the sun. Just dump, cook, and roll out the newspaper.Get the Slow-Cooker Shrimp Boil recipe.2Brown Sugar BBQ ChickenPHOTO: ANDREW BUI; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONPulled chicken is made so easy in the slow cooker, and this version includes brown sugar, a little Italian dressing, and bourbon for a bit of smokiness. Dress these up with homemade coleslaw for the greatest dinner with zero effort.Get the Brown Sugar BBQ Chicken recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below3Slow-Cooker Korean BeefPHOTO: ROCKY LUTEN; FOOD STYLING: MAKINZE GOREThis is not a drill: If you toss a pot roast (we went for bottom round roast, which doesn't break the bank) in the slow-cooker with a bunch of spices and soy sauce, you'll have killer Korean beef for dinner!Get the Slow-Cooker Korean Beef recipe. 4Slow-Cooker Garlic-Parmesan ChickenPHOTO: ROCKY LUTEN; FOOD STYLING: LENA ABRAHAMWhen you think Parm + chicken, you may be thinking of the melty, saucy chicken Parm, but you might like this version even more. All the flavor from the chicken thighs, butter, garlic, and thyme seep into the tender baby potatoes for a fully satisfying, comforting meal.Get the Slow-Cooker Garlic-Parmesan Chicken recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below5Slow-Cooker Quinoa ChiliPHOTO: RACHEL VANNI; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONUnlike traditional Texas chili, this one contains lots of beans, making it a high-protein vegan dish. A mix of vegetables come together with quinoa and beans, then marry with an array of spices to create a delicious and satisfying chili even meat-lovers will want seconds of.Get the Slow-Cooker Quinoa Chili recipe.6Slow-Cooker PizzaEthan CalabresePizza night just got even easier. While you can absolutely use a store-bought dough for this recipe, feel free to try our homemade pizza dough too.Get the Slow-Cooker Pizza recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below7Slow-Cooker Creamy Lemon Herb ChickenPHOTO: LUCY SCHAEFFER; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONBy cooking low and slow, the humble chicken breast is transformed into something that melts in your mouth. Lemon, herbs, and garlic infuse the chicken with loads of flavor with some cream at the end to round out the sauce.Get the Slow-Cooker Creamy Lemon Herb Chicken recipe. 8Slow-Cooker Chocolate Chip CookieParker feierbachIf you love crispy edges and gooey centers on your chocolate chip cookies, you've gotta make this cookie cake in your slow cooker. Never waste your time scooping out individual cookies again!Get the Slow-Cooker Chocolate Chip Cookie recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below9Slow-Cooker RibsPHOTO: ROCKY LUTEN; FOOD STYLING: BROOKE CAISONJust because you don’t have a giant smoker doesn’t mean you can’t enjoy and share a tender, well-seasoned rack of ribs. The prep is simple: Rub them with your favorite dry rub, load them into the slow cooker, smother them with BBQ sauce, and cook them completely hands-free until they’re falling off the bone.Get the Slow-Cooker Ribs recipe.10Crock-Pot Buffalo Chicken DipPHOTO: ANDREW BUI; FOOD STYLING: BARRETT WASHBURNEFact: A party is only as good as the Buffalo dip you serve. The best part? Your slow cooker will keep it warm and ready for dipping! Go all out and make a batch of homemade soft pretzels to serve with it.Get the Crock-Pot Buffalo Chicken Dip recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below11Slow-Cooker Pulled PorkKAT WIRSINGThe secret to really good pulled pork is cooking it low and slow, and lucky for you, a slow cooker makes the drawn-out process a breeze. This on a potato roll plus pickles and coleslaw (and potato chips, if you're feeling crazy) = absolute perfection.Get the Slow-Cooker Pulled Pork recipe.12Slow-Cooker Chex MixEthan CalabreseWe LOVE homemade baked Chex Mix, but it can be a little hands-on (you've got to stir it every 15 minutes!). Making it in your slow cooker is way easier.Get the Slow-Cooker Chex Mix recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below13Slow-Cooker Chicken Tortilla SoupPHOTO: ANDREW BUI; FOOD STYLING: MAKINZE GORESure, everyone loves chicken noodle soup, but for some of us, there's nothing that soothes the soul like a big bowl of chicken tortilla soup. That goes double when it's made in your slow cooker.Get the Slow-Cooker Chicken Tortilla Soup recipe.14Crock-Pot Salsa ChickenParker feierbach This slow-cooker meal made with only 4 ingredients is really something to celebrate. The chicken falls apart and becomes immensely tender, and is delicious alongsidea the familiar flavors of chunky salsa and taco seasoning, and brightened up with bursts of lime juice. Serve this over rice, in lettuce cups, or as tacos.Get the Crock-Pot Salsa Chicken recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below15Slow-Cooker Tuscan Chicken Meatballs With GnocchiPHOTO: ERIK BERNSTEIN; FOOD STYLING: MAKINZE GOREFor this recipe, we’re doubling down on the comfort by giving meatballs and gnocchi the Tuscan treatment, in one dish. What makes this even better? It all comes together in the slow cooker.Get the Slow-Cooker Tuscan Chicken Meatballs With Gnocchi recipe.16Shredded ﻿BeefPHOTO: ANDREW BUI; FOOD STYLING: MAKINZE GOREThe flavor profile for our shredded beef recipe mimics our carne asada with the use of garlic, scallions, orange juice, and chipotle chiles in adobo, which makes it the perfect addition to taco night, your favorite leafy green salad, or a buttery, toasted brioche bun.Get the Shredded Beef recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below17Crock-Pot Spinach Artichoke DipAndrew bui If spinach-artichoke dip is one of those things you get really excited about at a party but you feel like it takes too much effort, this slow-cooker version is for you. Don’t bother turning on the oven (especially when you have other appetizers like cranberry brie bites to bake).Get the Crock-Pot Spinach-Artichoke Dip recipe.18Crock-Pot Pepper SteakErik BernsteinPepper steak is a straightforward, savory sweet stir-fry that we think works amazingly when made in a slow cooker. The steak gets very tender, and it takes on some of the qualities of your favorite beef stew while still staying true to the original.Get the Crock-Pot Pepper Steak recipe.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below19Slow-Cooker Chicken AlfredoParker FeierbachWe love a nice creamy Alfredo, and this zero effort version of chicken Alfredo might be our new favorite. It's a perfect recipe for a date night or busy weeknight. Get the Slow-Cooker Chicken Alfredo recipe.  20Slow-Cooker Grape Jelly MeatballsEmily hlavac green Grape jelly on meatballs might not sound like an ideal combo, but trust us, it is! The sweet jelly mixed with smoky BBQ sauce is a match made in heaven.Get the Slow-Cooker Grape Jelly Meatballs recipe.Watch Next Advertisement - Continue Reading BelowWildly Delicious Weeknight DinnersEnchilada CasseroleCauliflower TacosChicken FajitasCacio E Pepe ChickenAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowPork Dumpling BowlsGreek Orzo SaladCheesy Taco Bake82 Simple Spring DinnersLemon Asparagus Pasta21 Recipes Meghan Markle Would Approve OfChicken Shawarma BowlsChicken & Broccoli CasseroleAdvertisement - Continue Reading BelowNewsletterSubscribeManage SubscriptionAbout UsDelish Test KitchenMedia KitCommunity GuidelinesAdvertise With UsDelish Shop Product SupportOther Hearst SubscriptionsDelish Unlimited Membership SupportTurn off Web NotificationsA Part of Hearst Digital MediaWe may earn commission from links on this page, but we only recommend products we back.©2025 Hearst Magazine Media, Inc. Day!)","introductory_text":"\u003cp\u003eWhether you're cooking for the whole family, are \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/g30538179/crockpot-recipes-for-two/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eslow cooking just for two\u003c/a\u003e, or need to feed a party, we can all agree—a crock-pot is kind of a miracle appliance. Though we bet you've already got some tried and true recipes (hello, standbys like \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a51267/slow-cooker-pulled-pork-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003epulled pork\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a21581186/slow-cooker-chili-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ebeef chili\u003c/a\u003e), why stop there? Slow cookers can do everything from breakfast to dessert (seriously!), so what are you waiting for? Check out these 97 slow-cooker recipes, then set it and forget it!\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eThere is NOTHING better than coming home from a long day to a home-cooked meal, and the slow cooker makes it easy, whether you're a beginner cook or someone with more experience who's constantly on the run. Classics like \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a55419/slow-cooker-chicken-alfredo-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003echicken Alfredo\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a36806011/crock-pot-pepper-steak-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003epepper steak\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a51806/slow-cooker-beef-broccoli-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ebeef \u0026 broccoli\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a23106011/slow-cooker-chicken-cacciatore-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003echicken cacciatore\u003c/a\u003e, and more might just taste \u003cem\u003eeven\u003c/em\u003e better in the crockpot (and are certainly way more hands-off than their skillet or baking dish counterparts). We've even got some recipes on this list you might have never thought you could make in a slow cooker. Trust us, you can make everything from \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a55258/slow-cooker-pizza-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003epizza\u003c/a\u003e to meatballs (like in our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a43865864/slow-cooker-tuscan-chicken-meatballs-with-gnocchi-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eslow-cooker Tuscan chicken meatballs with gnocchi\u003c/a\u003e) to \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a51531/slow-cooker-mac-cheese-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003emac \u0026 cheese\u003c/a\u003e in yours!\u003cbr\u003e\u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eWe also love how much easier a slow cooker makes cooking up all of your party faves. Consider making your favorite \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/g3093/slow-cooker-dips/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003edips\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/g41888935/crock-pot-appetizers/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eappetizers\u003c/a\u003e in your crockpot to save yourself a whole lot of stress and prep time. If you're low on oven or grilling space during game days, movie nights, or cookouts, use your slow cooker to make \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a47545/brown-sugar-bbq-chicken-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eBBQ brown sugar pulled chicken\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a44367/slow-cooker-buffalo-ranch-wings-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eBuffalo ranch wings\u003c/a\u003e, \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a30615986/slow-cooker-chicken-tinga-tacos-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003echicken tinga tacos\u003c/a\u003e, or \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a51176/slow-cooker-sausage-peppers-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003esausage \u0026 peppers\u003c/a\u003e. Grab a pack of slider buns or tortillas and you'll be ready to party! \u003c/p\u003e\u003cp\u003eYour slow cooker can even make sweets, and our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/a27791695/slow-cooker-banana-cake-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ecrock-pot banana cake\u003c/a\u003e, our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a58633/slow-cooker-chocolate-chip-cookie-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003eslow-cooker chocolate chip cookie\u003c/a\u003e, our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a50816/slow-cooker-hot-chocolate-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003ecrock-pot hot cocoa\u003c/a\u003e, and our \u003ca href=\"https://www.delish.com/cooking/recipe-ideas/recipes/a55057/pumpkin-spice-slow-cooker-oatmeal-recipe/\" target=\"_blank\"\u003epumpkin spice slow-cooker oatmeal\u003c/a\u003e are proof. cooking for the whole family, are slow cooking just for two, or need to feed a party, we can all agree—a crock-pot is kind of a miracle appliance. Though we bet you've already got some tried and true recipes (hello, standbys like pulled pork and beef chili), why stop there? Slow cookers can do everything from breakfast to dessert (seriously!), so what are you waiting for? Check out these 97 slow-cooker recipes, then set it and forget it!There is NOTHING better than coming home from a long day to a home-cooked meal, and the slow cooker makes it easy, whether you're a beginner cook or someone with more experience who's constantly on the run. Classics like chicken Alfredo, pepper steak, beef \u0026 broccoli, chicken cacciatore, and more might just taste even better in the crockpot (and are certainly way more hands-off than their skillet or baking dish counterparts). We've even got some recipes on this list you might have never thought you could make in a slow cooker. Trust us, you can make everything from pizza to meatballs (like in our slow-cooker Tuscan chicken meatballs with gnocchi) to mac \u0026 cheese in yours!We also love how much easier a slow cooker makes cooking up all of your party faves. Consider making your favorite dips and appetizers in your crockpot to save yourself a whole lot of stress and prep time. If you're low on oven or grilling space during game days, movie nights, or cookouts, use your slow cooker to make BBQ brown sugar pulled chicken, Buffalo ranch wings, chicken tinga tacos, or sausage \u0026 peppers. Grab a pack of slider buns or tortillas and you'll be ready to party! Your slow cooker can even make sweets, and our crock-pot banana cake, our slow-cooker chocolate chip cookie, our crock-pot hot cocoa, and our pumpkin spice slow-cooker oatmeal are proof. Whether you're making them for a crowd over the holidays or during the warmer months when you can't bear to turn on the oven, they're sure to satisfy.Loving the possibilities of countertop appliances?
